rrhvella.coursework1

Class ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • rrhvella.coursework1.ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MelodyGenerator

    public class ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies a context-sensitive stochastic L-system. A description of such a system is given in the essay submitted for the first part of this coursework.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem

        public ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem(java.lang.String axiom,
                                       java.util.HashMap<ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicPredecessor,java.lang.String> productions)
        Parameters:
        axiom - the axiom for this grammar.
        productions - the productions for this grammar as a dictionary which maps a predecessor to its successor.
        See Also:
        ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicPredecessor

      • ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem

        public ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicLSystem(java.lang.String axiom,
                                       java.util.HashMap<ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicPredecessor,java.lang.String> productions,
                                       boolean changeEntireContext)
        Parameters:
        axiom - the axiom for this grammar.
        productions - the productions for this grammar, as a dictionary which maps a predecessor to its successor.
        changeEntireContext - if true, then, at each iteration, this system will replace the predecessor, along with its entire context, with the successor. Otherwise, if this parameter is false, this system will only replace the predecessor.
